title: Texts Behind The Scenes Of Jan 6, Why Peloton’s Really Tanking 12.15.21
itunes:title: Texts Behind The Scenes Of Jan 6, Why Peloton’s Really Tanking 12.15.21
description:
In episode 1051, Jack and Miles are joined by podcaster, author, and TV personality Alison Rosen to discuss Mark Meadows’ texts make it clear, That Oz guy is all mad that the paper won’t call him DOCTOR OZ!!!!, Did the Sex and the City Reboot Really Just Kill … Peloton? and more!

  1. Mark Meadows’ texts make it clear
  2. That Oz guy is all mad that the paper won’t call him DOCTOR OZ!!!!
  3. Did the Sex and the City Reboot Really Just Kill … Peloton?
  4. Coke Officials Concerned About Commercial in ‘Natural Born Killers’
  5. Reebok sues TriStar over ‘Jerry’ tie-in
  6. Jaguar vs. Mad Men: How the company is dealing with the show's unflattering portrayal
  7. Peloton responds to surprise death in And Just Like That... with new commercial


Listen: Upworthy Weekly Podcast

Listen: I Dream (For You) by Com Truise
